title: Grand Theft Auto V (v1.0.505.2) Inc. DLC's -CorePack
description:
Grand Theft Auto V (v1.0.505.2) Inc. DLC's - RePack by CorePack



Title: Grand Theft Auto V
Year: 2015
Genre: Action-Adventure / Open World
Developer: Rockstar Games
Publisher: Rockstar Games
Languages: English + Multi10


NFO 
http://i.imgur.com/haZBlHx.png




INFO
1) Extract or Mount DISC 1 & DISC 2

2) Install DISC 1

3) Install DISC 2

4) Play !

NOTE 1: During installation, several CMD windows will popup, DO NOT mess with them, its compulsory part of the installation, let them finish and at the end you will get a message "Press any key to continue", that's where you need to press ENTER and continue with the installation.

NOTE 2: While installing DISC 2, Its recommended to disable your anti-virus, close all programs and wait for installation to finish !

NOTE 3: Final size must be 62.5 GB not more than that, if its more than that then your installation wasn't done properly, re-install ! And if its around 50-60 GB then still your installation wasn't done properly but you might still be able to play the game, but in some future missions you will run into problems so its better to re-install !

Additional Notes :

- Installation took 2 Hours on 4-Core CPU & normal HDD.

- Includes all DLC's & Patch Build 1.0.505.2

- Improved Gameplay Performance than Previous releases !

- No More Millions of Files During Installation.

- Based on RELOADED release
